task_from_config

Source: R/v1_task_from_config.R
task_from_config.Rd

task_from_config

task_from_config(
  name,
  type,
  cores = 1,
  db_table = NULL,
  filter = "",
  for_each_plan = NULL,
  for_each_argset = NULL,
  upsert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,
  insert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,
  action,
  schema = NULL,
  args = NULL
)

Arguments

name

Name of task
type

Type of task ("data","single", "analysis", "ui")
cores

Number of cores to run the task on
db_table

Database table
filter

Filter for the database table
for_each_plan

Create a plan for each value
for_each_argset

Create an argset for each value
upsert_at_end_of_each_plan

If TRUE, then schema$output is used to upsert at the end of each plan
insert_at_end_of_each_plan

If TRUE, then schema$output is used to insert at the end of each plan
action

Text
schema

List of schema mappings
args

List of args

Contents
